name: KOL-ESCENCE
description:
This is a student project made under the premise of creating a Meaningful Game. The goal of this project was to bring to light the dangers of Non-Renewable energies, in the game it creates energy faster but is fickle and deteriorates faster than Renewable energies.

You must complete the wonder to 100% to complete the game, their are multiple paths on ending the game, which deals with the environmental impact of your choices on the environment.

Compatible with all Android Devices.
